required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of HSK3486 in Patients With Hepatic Impairment
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Study to Investigate a Single Bolus Dose Followed With a 30 Minute Constant Infusion of HSK3486 on the Safety and Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of HSK3486 in Patients With Hepatic Impairment (Single-Center, Open-label, Parallel-Group)

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: Comparison of the pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of the HSK3486 in Patients With Mild and Moderate Hepatic Impairment Compared with Healthy Volunteers

detailed_description.textblock: This is a single-center, open-label, non-randomized, parallel-controlled Phase I clinical study carried out in patients with compensated chronic liver disease (Child-Pugh A), patients with decompensated chronic liver disease (Child-Pugh B), and age-, weight-, and gender-matched subjects with normal liver functions.

primary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
primary_outcome.description: Cmax（a measure of the body's exposure to HSK3486）will be compared between normal hepatic function patients and Patients with Compensated Chronic Liver Disease (Child-Pugh A) or Patients with Decompensated Chronic Liver Disease (Child-Pugh B).

primary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
primary_outcome.description: AUC（a measure of the body's exposure to HSK3486）will be compared between normal hepatic function patients and Patients with Compensated Chronic Liver Disease (Child-Pugh A) or Patients with Decompensated Chronic Liver Disease (Child-Pugh B).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: -5 minutes before administration until 1 hours post administration on day 1
-5 minutes before administration until 1 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: blood pressure（systolic, diastolic and mean arterial pressure）
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the screening to 3 days post-dose

intervention.description: HSK3486，Initially 0.4 mg/kg was administered as a 1 minute bolus, followed immediately by a constant infusion dose of 0.4 mg/kg/h administered as a 30 minute infusion via infusion pump.

overall_official.affiliation: Phase I Clinical Trial Laboratory，The First Hospital of Jilin University

facility.name: Phase I Clinical Trial Laboratory, The First Hospital of Jilin University

results_reference.citation: Qin L, Ren L, Wan S, Liu G, Luo X, Liu Z, Li F, Yu Y, Liu J, Wei Y. Design, Synthesis, and Evaluation of Novel 2,6-Disubstituted Phenol Derivatives as General Anesthetics. J Med Chem. 2017 May 11;60(9):3606-3617. doi: 10.1021/acs.jmedchem.7b00254. Epub 2017 Apr 28.
